root.name: Sega Vintage Collection: Monster World
root.description: OverviewSega Vintage Collection: Monster World is a video game compilation developed by M2 and published by Sega on May 23, 2012 for the Xbox 360 via Xbox Live Arcade. The compilation includes three titles from the Wonder Boy spin-off Monster World series: Wonder Boy in Monster Land, Wonder Boy in Monster World, and a newly localized version of Monster World IV.Each game includes various features, such as time trial modes, save states, and replays that can be shared with other players.All three games were also released separately for the PlayStation 3 via PlayStation Network, each including all of the features of the Xbox Live Arcade version plus twelve trophies for each game.
